tables.description: Operational table tracking current medication stock levels at retail pharmacy locations. Used to find where a patient can fill a prescription.

fields.name: pharmacy_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the specific pharmacy location.

fields.name: pharmacy_name
fields.description: Commercial name of the pharmacy chain (e.g., 'CVS', 'Walgreens').

fields.name: zip_code
fields.description: 5-digit zip code of the pharmacy location. Use this to find nearby pharmacies.

fields.name: medication_name
fields.description: Name of the medication. Matches the 'medication_display_name' from clinical records.

fields.name: stock_level
fields.description: Current number of units in stock. A value of 0 means 'Out of Stock'.

fields.name: last_updated
fields.description: Timestamp of when this stock level was last verified.

example_queries.natural_language_question: Which pharmacies in 10001 have Lisinopril in stock?
example_queries.sql_query: SELECT pharmacy_name, stock_level FROM `pharmacy_ops.pharmacy_ops.inventory` WHERE zip_code = '10001' AND medication_name = 'Lisinopril' AND stock_level > 0

example_queries.natural_language_question: Is Atorvastatin available at any CVS in zip code 10002?
example_queries.sql_query: SELECT pharmacy_id, stock_level FROM `pharmacy_ops.pharmacy_ops.inventory` WHERE zip_code = '10002' AND pharmacy_name LIKE '%CVS%' AND medication_name = 'Atorvastatin'

example_queries.natural_language_question: What is the total stock of Metformin across all pharmacies in 10003?
example_queries.sql_query: SELECT SUM(stock_level) FROM `pharmacy_ops.pharmacy_ops.inventory` WHERE zip_code = '10003' AND medication_name = 'Metformin'
